name: Fighting Monster:Samurai Power
description:
Fighting Monster: Samurai Power is an epic fun game in which you will show all your fighting skills and kung fu martial arts moves. Legend samurai warrior and kung fu fighting skills, the King has assigned you to take revenge from evil goblins, samurai, gladiator to save his kingdom.
Features:
- Unstoppable fighting combo
- Breathtaking assassination war missions
- Special moves and super powers
- Realistic 3D Environment
- Amazing graphics
